Description.Text: Hotel Boss offers a variety of accommodation options that cater to the needs of modern business and leisure travellers. With 1,500 modern contemporary designed guest rooms and eleven room types, ranging from Standard, Superior, Twin, Triple, Family to Premier, you will be spoilt for choices.

Hotel boss is located near to Little India and Arab street, it is an excellent location to explore Singapore's historical and cultural heritage. The hotel is also within convenient distance to the central business district. There are a vibrant array of nightlife and entertainment choices surrounding the hotel all within walking distance.
The hotel serves breakfast, lunch and dinner. Hotel also offer halal choices.
This accommodation has a large lobby.
